name: ChangedFiles
description: Pipeline task to check if some files changed since last build
author: Touchify

inputs.name: rules
inputs.label: Filter rules
inputs.helpMarkDown: A glob value per line to filter files that needs to be checked. Also allows to define multiple variables.

inputs.name: variable
inputs.label: Default variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the default output variable to set to be available in next steps/jobs/stages.

inputs.name: isOutput
inputs.label: Is output
inputs.helpMarkDown: Are variables available in next stages?

inputs.name: filterOnBranchName
inputs.label: Filter on branch name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable filtering changes by branch name

inputs.name: refBranchName
inputs.label: Name of reference branch name to compare with
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable filtering changes based on the reference branch name
